trans-unit.source: Controls how Unicode characters are interpreted by the <see cref="Overload:System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 控制 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode" /> 方法如何解释 Unicode 字符。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how Unicode characters are supposed to be encoded in HTML, see [Using character escapes in markup and CSS](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=256607).
trans-unit.target: 有关怎样 Unicode 字符的详细信息以进行 HTML 编码，请参阅[中标记和 CSS 使用字符转义](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=256607)。

trans-unit.source: The decoding behavior is determined by current application's target Framework.
trans-unit.target: 解码行为由当前应用程序的目标框架确定。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] and later, the Unicode encoding decoding is strict.
trans-unit.target: 对于 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 以及更高版本，Unicode 编码解码使用严格行为。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that incoming data is not checked for validity before being decoded.
trans-unit.target: 指定在解码前不检查传入数据的有效性。

trans-unit.source: For example, an input string of "&amp;#xD84C;" would decode as U+D84C, which is an unpaired surrogate.
trans-unit.target: 例如，输入字符串“&amp;#xD84C;”会解码为 U+D84C，后者是一个不成对的代理。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the decoder does not understand code points in the SMP unless they're represented as HTML-encoded surrogates, so the inputstring "&#144308;" would result in the output string "&#144308;".
trans-unit.target: 此外，除非码位表示为 HTML 编码的代理，否则解码器无法知道 SMP 中的码位，因此输入字符串“&#144308;”可能会生成输出字符串“&#144308;”。

trans-unit.source: Similar to <see cref="F:System.Net.Configuration.UnicodeDecodingConformance.Compat" /> in that there are no validity checks, but the decoder also understands code points.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="F:System.Net.Configuration.UnicodeDecodingConformance.Compat" /> 类似，没有有效性检查，但解码器也知道码位。

trans-unit.source: The input string "&#144308;" would decode into the character U+233B4 correctly.
trans-unit.target: 输入字符串“&#144308;”正确解码为字符 U+233B4。

trans-unit.source: This switch is meant to provide maximum interoperability when the decoder doesn't know which format the provider is using to generate the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 此开关在解码器不知道提供程序用于生成编码字符串的格式时提供最大互操作性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the incoming encoded data is checked for validity before being decoded.
trans-unit.target: 指定在解码前不检查传入的编码数据的有效性。

trans-unit.source: For example, an input string of "&#144308;" would decode as U+233B4, but an input string of "&#xD84C;&#xDFB4;" would fail to decode properly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，输入字符串“&#144308;”解码为 U+233B4，但输入字符串“&#xD84C;&#xDFB4;”无法正确解码。

trans-unit.source: Already-decoded data in the string is not checked for validity.
trans-unit.target: 不会检查字符串中已解码数据的有效性。

trans-unit.source: For example, an input string of "\ud800" will result in an output string of "\ud800", as the already-decoded surrogate is skipped during decoding, even though it is unpaired.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在解码期间跳过已解码的代理，即使该代理是不成对的代理，输入字符串“\ud800”都会生成输出字符串“\ud800”。
